title: Ticket #6010: GCE listInstances requests of over 500 instances are paginated
description:
Currently listInstances calls of over 500 instances are paginated. The GCE GAHP server does not handle these paginated replies correctly.

The attached patch (coming soon) will address this and concatenate the paginated replies so that over 500 instances can be supported by GAHP.
